email_text:
Subject: Announcement: Company Wellness Day

Dear Team,

I am pleased to announce that our company will be hosting a Wellness Day on [date]. This day will be dedicated to promoting healthy lifestyles and well-being among our employees.

Activities planned for the day include yoga sessions, mindfulness workshops, healthy cooking demonstrations, and health screenings. We believe that taking care of our physical and mental health is essential to our overall well-being and productivity at work.

Please mark your calendars and stay tuned for more details on the schedule and how to sign up for the various activities. We encourage all employees to participate and make the most of this opportunity to focus on your health and wellness.

Thank you for your continued dedication and hard work. We look forward to seeing you all at the Wellness Day!

Best regards,

[Your Name]
HR Manager
